en.content: You press yourself against the biggest trunk you can find. Two horses draw near, their riders holding up lanterns. Branches cast a maze of shifting shadows across you as they pass.
To your dismay, one rider pulls his horse up short.
“Look! There!” He stabs a finger towards you.

zh.content: 你躲到你能找到最粗的树干后面。两匹马越来越近，马车的车夫举着提灯。马车所过之处，枝干投射出游移的阴影，像迷宫一般在你面前晃动。
令你失望的是，一个车夫突然停住了他的马。

text.en: Try to talk your way past one of the guard groups
Try to slip past in disguise
